title: Proud remembrance
creator_credit: Artransa Films, Una Daniel and Frederick Daniel
brief_description: Melbourne’s Shrine of Remembrance - a fitting and permanent tribute to the service men and women of two world wars who paid the supreme sacrifice in battle. Story themes and narrative by Morris West. Photography by Geoff Thompson.
